name: Squash Flat
text: You can bull rush an opponent straight to the ground.
prerequisites: Improved Bull Rush, Merciless Rush, worshiper of Rovagug.
benefit: Whenever you make a bull rush attack and your combat maneuver check exceeds the target’s CMD by 5 or more, you can attempt to trip the target as part of your bull rush as a free action. This does not provoke an attack of opportunity.
staminaText: After succeeding at a bull rush combat maneuver check, you can spend 4 stamina points to attempt to trip the target with Squash Flat regardless of your bull rush combat maneuver check’s result.
prerequisites_zh: 精通冲撞，横冲直撞，信仰洛瓦古格。
benefit_zh: 当你对一个生物发动冲撞战技攻击且你的检定结果超过对方的CMD5点或更多，那么你可以选择不将对手额外击退5尺，而是在你的冲撞战技攻击的同时发动一次摔绊战技攻击作为冲撞的一部分，这次摔绊战技不会引发借机攻击。
